title: totalvi_leiden
description: Run totalVI integration, followed by neighbour calculations, leiden clustering and UMAP.

Dataset input.title: Dataset input
Dataset input.description: Dataset input using nf-tower "dataset" or "data explorer". Allows for the input of multiple         parameter sets to initialise a Nextflow channel.

param_list.description: Dataset input can either be a list of maps, a csv file, a json file, a yaml file, or simply a yaml                 blob. The names of the input fields (e.g. csv columns, json keys) need to be an exact match with the workflow input parameters.

input.description: Input h5mu file to be integrated.

prot_modality.description: Name of the modality in the input (query) h5mu file containing protein data

input_layer_rna.description: Input layer to use from the rna modality for gene counts

input_layer_protein.description: Input layer to use from the protein modality for protein counts

obs_batch.description: Column name discriminating between your batches.

obs_size_factor.description: Key in adata.obs for size factor information

obs_categorical_covariate.description: Keys in adata.obs that correspond to categorical data

obs_continuous_covariate.description: Keys in adata.obs that correspond to continuous data

var_gene_names.description: .var column in the rna modality containing gene names

var_protein_names.description: .var column in the protein modality containing protein names

output.help_text: Type: `file`, multiple: `False`, required, default: `"$id.$key.output.h5mu"`, direction: `output`, example: `"output.h5mu"`.

output_model.description: Directory where the trained reference model will be stored.

max_epochs.description: Number of passes through the dataset, defaults to (20000 / number of cells) * 400 or 400; whichever is smallest.

early_stopping.description: Whether to perform early stopping with respect to the validation set.

obsm_integrated.description: In which .obsm slot to store the resulting integrated embedding.

obsm_normalized_rna_output.description: In which .obsm slot to store the normalized RNA data from TOTALVI.

obsm_normalized_protein_output.description: In which .obsm slot to store the normalized protein data from TOTALVI.

uns_neighbors.description: In which .uns slot to store various neighbor output objects.

obsp_neighbor_distances.description: In which .obsp slot to store the distance matrix between the resulting neighbors.

obsp_neighbor_connectivities.description: In which .obsp slot to store the connectivities matrix between the resulting neighbors.

obs_cluster.description: Prefix for the .obs keys under which to add the cluster labels

leiden_resolution.description: Control the coarseness of the clustering

obsm_umap.description: In which .obsm slot to store the resulting UMAP embedding.

nextflow input-output arguments.title: Nextflow input-output arguments
nextflow input-output arguments.description: Input/output parameters for Nextflow itself. Please note that both publishDir and publish_dir are supported but at least one has to be configured.
